title: To taste 100 herbs: gods, ancestors and medicine
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/China - Social conditions
description: Episode number 3 of Series "Long Bow Trilogy". A rich portrait of a traditional Chinese doctor, and his special role in the community. Dr. Shen Fa Sheng discusses his Catholic religion, medical ethics, rural health services, and handed down knowledge of herbal treatments. The closeness and traditions of family life in China are wonderfully captured in scenes of prayer, play, chores and celebrations.
